codeSystems.name: EHDSIActiveIngredient
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Active Ingredient
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used as a mandatory code for the Active Ingredient of medications in the Medications Summary as well as the prescription Sections. Also used to code allergy agents in the Allergies and Other Adverse Reactions Section of the patient Summary.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIAllergenNoDrug
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Allergen No Drug
codeSystems.description: The value set is used to code the patient's kind of adverse reactions against substance, food or drugs

codeSystems.name: EHDSIAllergyCertainty
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Allergy Certainty
codeSystems.description: Value Set is used to support or decline the clinical status of the allergy or intolerance

codeSystems.name: EHDSIAllergyStatus
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Allergy Status
codeSystems.description: The value set is used to code the Allergy or Intolerance Clinical Status

codeSystems.name: EHDSIAnimalSpecies
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Animal Species
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code the animal species of specimen subject (animal of the patient)

codeSystems.name: EHDSIBloodGroup
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Blood Group
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code the value of patientâ€™s blood group + Rh

codeSystems.name: EHDSIBloodPressure
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Blood Pressure
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used for the observations of Blood Pressure recorded in the section for Vital Signs Observations in the Patient Summary. It codes what type of pressure (diastolic, systolic) is measured.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIBodySite
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Body Site
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used for the details about the anatomical location of a specimen in the Laboratory Result Report or the target body location of a procedure in the Patient Summary.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIBodySiteLaterality
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Body Site Laterality
codeSystems.description: This Value Set is used for the body structure site laterality qualifier. It indicates the body site laterality from which a laboratory specimen is collected.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIBodyStructureLocation
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Body Structure Location Qualifier
codeSystems.description: This Value Set is used for the body structure location qualifier. Concepts modifying the anatomic location.

codeSystems.name: EHDSICertainty
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Certainty
codeSystems.description: Value Set is used to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis

codeSystems.name: EHDSICodeProb
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Code Prob
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used as an optional description of a problem in the patient Summary. It gives an information on the circumstances under which the problem was defined/discovered.

codeSystems.name: EHDSICountry
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Country
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to identify the nationality of all persons and organizations.

codeSystems.name: EHDSICriticality
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Criticality
codeSystems.description: Value set is used to estimate of the potential clinical harm, or seriousness, of a reaction to an identified substance

codeSystems.name: EHDSICurrentPregnancyStatus
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Current Pregnancy Status
codeSystems.description: Value set is used to provide the woman's current state at the date the observation was made

codeSystems.name: EHDSIDisplayLabel
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Display Label
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to denominate all the labels and messages adopted for the eHDSI CDA display

codeSystems.name: EHDSIDocumentCode
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Document Code
codeSystems.description: Defines to which category the document belongs to : summary, prescription, or dispensation.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIExceptionalValue
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Exceptional Value
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code exceptional values for the required binding in FHIR IGs

codeSystems.name: EHDSILabCode
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Laboratory Codes
codeSystems.description: This Value Set is used for the standard laboratory codes

codeSystems.name: EHDSILabSpecimenType
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Laboratory Specimen Type
codeSystems.description: This Value Set is used for the kind of material that forms the specimen

codeSystems.name: EHDSILabStudyType
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Laboratory Study Types
codeSystems.description: eHDSI Laboratory Study Types. Notes: Note 1: 26436-6 (Laboratory studies) enables issuing a report putting together observations from multiple specialties (disciplines) in the same text block, allowing delivery of a global interpretation comment at the end of the text block that will be rendered at the end of the report. Note 2: Mycology and parasitology, as well as bacteriology, are part of the 18725-2 (Microbiology studies (set)) studies. Note 3: Virology MAY be included in 18725-2 (MICROBIOLOGY STUDIES) or 18727-8 (SEROLOGY STUDIES) or split between both study types, depending upon the Content Creator Actorâ€™s choice.

codeSystems.name: EHDSILabTechnique
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Laboratory Technique
codeSystems.description: This Value Set is used to encode laboratory technique for the result measurement

codeSystems.name: EHDSILaboratoryReportType
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Laboratory Report Types
codeSystems.description: eHDSI Laboratory Report Types

codeSystems.name: EHDSILanguage
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Language
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to identify the language the document will be written with.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIMorphologicAbnormality
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Morphologic Abnormality
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code the morphological abnormalities of the anatomical location where the material is taken.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIObservationCategory
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Observation category
codeSystems.description: This Value Set is used for the Laboratory Observation Results Category code

codeSystems.name: EHDSIObservationInterpretation
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Observation Interpretation
codeSystems.description: This Value Set is used for a rough qualitative interpretation of the Laboratory Observation Results

codeSystems.name: EHDSIOutcomeOfPregnancy
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Outcome of Pregnancy
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code the outcome of previous pregnancy

codeSystems.name: EHDSIPerformerFunction
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Performer Function
codeSystems.description: Laboratory Performer Function

codeSystems.name: EHDSIPersonalRelationship
codeSystems.title: eHDSI PersonalRelationship
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used (optionally) to code the type of contact relationship between a person and the patient.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIPregnancyInformation
codeSystems.title: eHDSI PregnancyInformation
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to determine the patient's delivery date estimation.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIPresenceAbsence
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Presence Absence
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to describe presence and absence findings (qualifier values) of the Laboratory Test Results

codeSystems.name: EHDSIQuantityUnit
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Quantity Unit
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to describe the discrete countible entity in which a pharmaceutical product or manufactured item is presented.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIRareDisease
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Rare Disease
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to describe the problems and medication reasons.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIReactionAllergy
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Reaction Allergy
codeSystems.description: Value Set is used to encode clinical manifestation of the allergic reaction.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIReferenceRangeAppliesTo
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Reference Range Applies To
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the particular target population the reference range applies to

codeSystems.name: EHDSIReferenceRangeMeaning
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Reference Range Meaning
codeSystems.description: This value set defines a set of codes for a reference range qualifier

codeSystems.name: EHDSIResolutionOutcome
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Resolution Outcome
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to describe the clinical status of a problem outcome.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIRoleClass
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Role Class
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to make the distinction between an emergency contact and the next of kin for a patient.

codeSystems.name: EHDSISection
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Section
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used for naming the sections used by the three CDA-documents

codeSystems.name: EHDSISeverity
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Severity
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used for all Problems and Allergies in the Patient Summary to indicate the severity of the problem (or Allergy)

codeSystems.name: EHDSISocialHistory
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Social History
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code the different elements of the patient's social history.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIStatusCode
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Status Code
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code the different elements of the patient's social history.

codeSystems.name: EHDSISubstance
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Substance
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to code the substances of medicine.

codeSystems.name: EHDSITelecomAddress
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Telecom Address
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used (optionally) to code the usage of a phone number, email and all telecommunications. Can be used for all phone numbers mentioned in the three CDA-documents.

codeSystems.name: EHDSIVaccine
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Vaccine
codeSystems.description: The Value Set is used to identify the patient's vaccinations in the Patient Summary
